      • readMessage

        public Message readMessage​(long timeout)
                    throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: PeerConnection
        Attempt to read an incoming message within a specified time interval. Invocation blocks the calling thread until either a message is read or the limit of waiting time is reached. Note that implementation may buffer all received data and try to read next message from the buffer, so calling this method does not necessarily imply I/O access.
        Specified by:
        readMessage in interface PeerConnection
        Returns:
        Message, or null if there isn't any
